DOC.brief_summary: Postmenopausal women will receive testosterone gel or matching placebo gel daily. Sebum excretion rates will be measured before and after 6 weeks of treatment.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Investigate Biomarkers of Skin Androgenization Following Testosterone Administration (0000-015)(COMPLETED).
DOC.criteria: Subject is at least 3 years postmenopausal Subject is in good general health Subject is willing to avoid excess alcohol or strenuous physical activity during the study Subject has donated a unit of blood or has taken an investigational drug in another clinical trial in the last 4 weeks Subject is a regular user of any illicit drugs Subject drinks excessive amounts of coffee, tea or cola Subject has used an estrogen or progestogens hormone replacement therapy in the past 6 months Subject has a history of cancer Subject has acne
